title: My Account Perma suspended and hacked
body:
My main Account on OCE "Angelliss" told me i had a ban, so i went to check my emails as it asked to find no email. then when i went to log in to submit a ticket my account would not log in "incorrect username, password and region etc. Tried to reset password but the account name is no longer sending to my email address. There is no direct support for riot which is really bugging me, my account is worth id say over $2500 and the only thing ive done wrong is get salty (dont we all).
If anyone knows what to do or point some devs my way would be great.

replies.body:
looks like you are screwed

Riot rarely cares enough to un perma ban someone, even if its 100 percent unjustified.

I pulled up your account, and it looks like there was some suspicious activity going on and someone might have gotten control of your account. Hit us up in our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll be able to help you get your account back and go over everything there!
hey, i have already submitted one through the form. the account is about 6 years old when it asked the date exactly i improvised. Thank you for the fast responce.
